content: ratjetoe by erika westerop cello knits © 2015 materials rowan felted tweed dk & rowan fine tweed leftovers 62 gram in total set sock needles 3 mm tapestry needle scrap yarn ratjetoe = dutch for hodgepodge is a diverse project to use up your leftovers and experiment with colors and stitch patterns i wrote down the pattern for the left abbreviations armwarmer as a guideline but feel free to make an unique one with your own colors and stitches as you can see i ended up with two different ones and with some color p = purl combinations i wouldn t have chosen normally i ran out of my favorite leftovers but k = knit that made it interesting and challenging happy knitting round s = round s tbol = through back of loop m1r = make 1 right m1l = make 1 left sts = stitches increase = increase decrease = decrease stst = stocking stitch yo = yarn over ssk = slip slip knit decrease = together gauge for 10 x 10 cm 4x4 inch smooth color changes = 26 sts x 34 row in stst when working in the round look up some free tutorials on size jogless stripes on the one size fits most internet directions chart 1 cast on 60 sts with needles 3 mm and color rage using the german twisted cast on for an elastic hem join in the round making sure not to twist your stitches *knit 2 rnds in twisted rib k1tbol/p1 - rage - 150 *knit 9 rnds in twisted rib - maritime - 167 * k1tbol p3 repeat 14 times work 5 more rnds like this - duck egg - 173 *work chart 1 in round 5 decrease 2 sts - watery - 152 / celadon - 184 58 sts * knit 2 rnds/purl 1 round repeat 2 times knit 2 rnds in the 2nd purl round decrease 2 sts - celadon 56 sts *work chart 2 in round 1 decrease 2 sts - keld - 363 / avocado - 161 / dent - 373 54 chart 2 sts *knit 2 rnds with duck egg & decrease 2 sts in 1st round purl 1 round with skipton - 379 purl 1 round & knit 2 rnds with duck egg 52 sts *knit 1 round with celadon & decrease 2 sts in this round 50 sts *k1tbol/p1 - 5 rnds with richmond - 381 1 round with maritime - 167 and 2 rnds with richmond 1 round with maritime and 1 more round with richmond *knit 1 round with celadon & decrease 2 sts in this round 48 sts *work chart 3 in round 5 decrease 2 sts - pine - 158 & rage 46 sts * knit 2 rnds/purl 1 round repeat 1 time knit 2 rnds in the very last knit round increase 2 sts - duck egg 48 sts chart 3 *work following lace pattern rnds 1 & 3 k2/p1 - round 2 k2 p1 yo ssk
